original_text: The Abana and Pharpar rivers in Damascus are better than any of the rivers in Israel. Surely, I could wash in those rivers and become clean!’ So Naaman turned around and he went away. He was very angry.
korean_text: 다메섹 강 아바나와 바르발은 이스라엘 모든 강물보다 낫지 아니하냐 내가 거기서 몸을 씻으면 깨끗하게 되지 아니하랴 하고 몸을 돌려 분노하여 떠나니

sentences.original_text: The Abana and Pharpar rivers in Damascus
sentences.korean_translation: 다마스쿠스에 있는 아바나 강과 바르발 강

sentences.original_text: are better than any of the rivers in Israel
Surely, I could wash in those rivers
sentences.korean_translation: 분명히, 나는 그 강들에서 씻을 수 있습니다
